page.title: 10INSH MARSHES - 3
page.content:
Work to improve the Reserve is constantand is carried out by{one full {time warden}and numerous summer helpers. Ditches are restored,, trees are planted and{free grazing}is given to local farmers in an effort to ccombat sedge and rushes and allow other natural vegetation to grow through.
The Reserve is appreciated by local people and visitor alike and there is a{general interest in wildlife.} Bird watching can be enjoyed during one's ddaily life rather than on special forays to such reserves. Experienced bird watchers and casual tourists come from all countries of Europe and beyond. Its proximity to the A9 and its situation in an area of such {unspoilt countryside}adds to its attraction.
